attributes.action: immediately hold a referendum on EU withdrawal or continued membership in light of our current recession and the EU plans to ban plasma TVs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our economy is in a mess and the EU want to ban plasma televisions. This will be a particular blow to hospital patients and people who already own one. 

In an economic recession, preventing the sale of plasma TVs will further the harm to the economy. 

As we are in a recession and need more money in our economy and need to be able to make our own decisions, we call upon the PM to hold a referendum that asks whether or not we want to continue to be a full EU member, become an associate member, or completely withdraw. 

The money saved by withdrawing from the EU would help us out of the recession and put pay to any plans of having plasma TVs banned.
